main.name: Ville Martas
main.bio: I am a third year software engineer student stydying at LUT-University. I have already finished my Bachelor's Thesis, and i'm currently finishing the rest of my Bachelor's courses while simultaneously doing courses for my Master's degree. I'm currently looking for work in software development, main interests being web-, game-, and VR-development. Contact me via phone or email!
main.contactmessage: Parhaiten minuun saa yhteyden soittamalla tai sähköpostiviestillä.

resume.skillmessage: I have experience with the following technologies

education.description: During my high school years I spent one year at Örebro, Sweden as an exhance student.

work.title: Off-Trade Sales promoter
work.description: During the summer seasons I worked at multiple supermarkets around southern Finland maintaining and ordering Sinebrychoff products in cooperation with the shopkeepers.

work.title: Assistant teacher
work.description: I worked as a assistant teacher during the reading vacation (lukuloma) before the finals

work.title: Cashier / Warehouse worker
work.description: Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.

work.title: Caddiemaster
work.description: During summers 2011 and 2012 I worked at a golf course near my home. I did both caddiemaster office work and physical field work at the golf course

other.title: Part of a team handling business relationships
other.description: Cooperation and sponsorships of Cluster and different companies.

other.title: Contact person for TEK (Tekniikan Akateemiset)
other.description: Middleman between the university guild Cluster and Tekniikan Akateemiset

other.title: Host of the guild
other.description: Organized different events and worked with hosts and hostesses of other guilds.

other.title: Student
other.description: Reserve officer training during my military service

projects.title: Postified

projects.title: Linnunrata invasion
projects.category: Turn-based videogame created with Unity, 3d-models with Blender. Github link in video description.

projects.title: Sudoku Solver
projects.category: Small weekend project. Solver created with python that solves any (solvable) sudoku!

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
